If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by WhatsApp or Write to us at: support@codesforever.com

Its a Digital Delivery which means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.

No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you

Full Version of Window 7 Home and get upgrade on Window 10 

The key is for one (1) device only.

This is a 100 % Original Microsoft Windows 7 Home Product Key

The product key will activate the  full version of Windows 7 Home

There will be no expire date, the Windows 7 Home Product Key will have a lifetime duration.

The Windows 7 Home Pro Product Key will activate the multilingual language version.
